title.narrative: Belize Chemicals and Waste Management Project

description.narrative: The project aims to assist the country in implementing its relevant obligations under the Stockholm Convention to reduce the releases of Unintentional POPs emissions and to build country’s capacity to manage chemicals and waste.

title.narrative: Consultancy to Develop a Chemicals and Waste Management Strategy and Action Plan and a Disposal Plan
Procurement of one new Mechanical Cane Harvester
PROVISION OF SERVICES FOR THE FINAL DISPOSAL OF POPS CHEMICALS IN BELIZE.

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Number of new partnership mechanisms with funding for sustainable management solutions of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste at national and/or sub-national level
Number of additional males benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Number of additional females benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Total number of additional people benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste

The project aims to assist the country in implementing its relevant obligations under the Stockholm Convention to reduce the releases of Unintentional POPs emissions and to build country’s capacity to manage chemicals and waste.
capital of a political entity
Energy - policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: Capacity-building for sustainable Natural Resource Mgmt

description.narrative: To enhance Belize’s institutional and organizational capacities for sustainable natural resource management for the effective leveraging of finances to meet Rio Convention Objectives.

title.narrative: Capacity Building for Sustainable Natural Resource Management PRODOC

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

The goal of this project is for Belize to meet and sustain Rio Convention obligations through a more holistic and cost-effective approach of environmental and nat. resource mgmt for shared national development and global environmental priorities.

description.narrative: The project is in line with GEF-6 strategic focal area on climate change mitigation, objective CCM3 on fostering enabling conditions to mainstream mitigation concerns into sustainable development strategies.

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to enable Belize to prepare its Fourth National Communication (FNC) under decision 17/CP7 and the First Biennial Update Report (BUR) under decision 2/CP17 of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.

title.narrative: Strengthening National Systems for United Nations Convention Against Corruption Implementation in Belize

description.narrative: This Project aims to strengthen national structures to implement the UNCAC in Country. The Government of Belize will accede to the UNCAC in December 2016 and will then begin the implementation process.

title.narrative: Integrated Mgmt of prod. landscapes to deliver GEB's

description.narrative: The project aims at mainstreaming biodiversity conservation and sustainable land/water management into production landscapes in Belize and build resilience to climate change.
